website_summaries.verdict: A good option for anyone who wants a small drop safe for home or office use.
pros: Multiple access lock features a keypad and individual keys
Keypad is easy to set up and use
Slot design is small enough for money and letters
cons: Does not have as much space as other, more expensive safe options

customer_reviews.title: Good quality easy to program. I’ll buy another
customer_reviews.text: I just got it, but I am very comfortable with it already. Not unhappy at all about the workmanship! Looks sturdy for the price. Easy to program. And change programming. I think I’ll buy another one for my home. This one’s for my office
customer_reviews.author: Kijana

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is pure junk! Money was dropped in, once I entered the key into the key hole, it got stuck and would not come off. I had to break it to get to the money. All it took was 3 hits with a small hammer to break into this! I inadvertently found out how easy it is to break this! I then returned it only for them to claim, the same item was not returned and recharged my card. You make the call if you want to buy this.
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: Safe arrived "safe and sound"
customer_reviews.text: SereneLife safe arrived in a timely manner and was easy to set up. Accompanying the safe are 4 bolts for anchoring it. These are the molly type anchors suitable for drywall, etc. You would need a different sort of anchoring bolts if going into wood. The handle on the safe is made of plastic and seems like it could break with rough handling. Overall, I am satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: B'Jay

customer_reviews.title: Handle broke off to open door
customer_reviews.text: The day I got the safe and was testing the code to open it, the handle broke off. A few pieces fell on the ground and most of the small ones fell inside the door. Now I have to take apart the door to see if I can fix it. If not, it will be returned. Very unfortunate.. I wouldn't recommend this safe for any type of business.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: works well. It is small enough to fit somewhere ...
customer_reviews.text: works well. It is small enough to fit somewhere discrete and the key pad combo works well. My only feedback is that the key pad beep noise is a little on the loud side. Not sure what is up with that.
customer_reviews.author: Julie A.

customer_reviews.title: Great Safe! Write this review when I received the first one. Since then I’ve ordered two more and had to return both -
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product! Good size for safekeeping important documents and easy to open & close. More convenient than a safe deposit box.
customer_reviews.author: Marcie

customer_reviews.title: great safe
customer_reviews.text: We are using this safe for our employees to make simple cash drops. Easy to secure to floor or wall. Easy to set the combination and comes with back up keys.
customer_reviews.author: Tonia Spille

customer_reviews.title: This is a great safe. I serves my purpose very well
customer_reviews.text: This is a great safe. I serves my purpose very well.
customer_reviews.author: Sheldon Storey

customer_reviews.title: Easy Installation
customer_reviews.text: This save was easy to install and use. I'm now confident that all my valuable will be completely safe no matter if I'm in the home or out for any duration.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Lujan

customer_reviews.title: Very weird and annoying.
customer_reviews.text: This safe works for our purposes, but it beeps really loud when pushing the keypad buttons, I wish you could turn it off or at least turn it down. But the main problem with this safe is that I have to put the code in twice to get it to open. It always works on the second try, but I always have to type it in twice. The first time it says it has opened (the light turns green) but will not allow the lock to turn. The second time it also turns green and then the lock turns. Very weird and annoying.
customer_reviews.author: J. DeVita

customer_reviews.title: Size and rugged, great value
customer_reviews.text: Liked the size, easy to mount securely. Quality is good value
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Kunze

customer_reviews.title: Happy Customer
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product well worth the money spent for a safe used for nightly deposits.
customer_reviews.author: Cushwa Brewing Co.

customer_reviews.title: Great for low security needs!
customer_reviews.text: Likes: I like the ease of setting up and dual lock system (keypad + keys) Dislikes: too lightweight and no floor adhesion when bolting is not an option
customer_reviews.author: Luv

customer_reviews.title: Very poorly made
customer_reviews.text: The knob fell off and we can no longer open the safe it’s only been in use for five months
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Filmsy locking mechanism that comes loose - useless safe.
customer_reviews.text: Filmsy locking mechanism that comes loose frequently. Have to open up the door panel to assemble the mechanism every time. Too much trouble. Too bulky and heavy to return it.
customer_reviews.author: C.C.

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: Broke within 1.5 months of having it now past return window
customer_reviews.author: DeAnna

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Everything I needed for my money and two pistols and still have alot of run. For more stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Jose A.

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: Loved there was more than one to access the safe
customer_reviews.author: Niqua

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product
customer_reviews.text: Great for my small business do employees can do cash drops when I’m not in the office
customer_reviews.author: Alan Najera

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic safe, very strong and good quality. Very fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this safe for my office as a place to put cash easily and that could be opened with just a code. This safe is perfect. We mounted it to a wall in the closet and it's working out perfectly. It does come with mounting hardware for cement walls but we have dry walls and had to run out to the hardware store. The safe arrived timely as promised and works exactly as promised. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: LK

customer_reviews.title: Never could get the keypad to work. Returned it ...
customer_reviews.text: Never could get the keypad to work. Returned it for another. Same problem. I don't know if they tried to return my old one to me or what, but I couldn't even set the code. I tried going to their website to put in a trouble ticket and they just said to return it for a replacement. Two tries is enough, though....
customer_reviews.author: Amkt

customer_reviews.title: Fine for the price but can be opened REALLY easy ...
customer_reviews.text: Fine for the price but can be opened REALLY easy without a key or code.... just a simple YouTube video. Also, malfunctioned and locked me out so keep your key handy.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The drop box safe is easy to operate & very useful for a small business like ours.
customer_reviews.author: Vangi Reagan

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this safe in the middle of December of 2017. It was to replace a safe that I had had for many years. To my surprise last night when I was trying to get into the safe the dial did not work. It just spun around in circles. In addition to that the key did not work either. I was forced to have a friend smash it with a hammer to get into it which was quite easy to do. I do not recommend this safe at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little safe.
customer_reviews.text: Great little safe, with sturdy, solid construction. The drop slot is a great feature. Arrived right on time.
customer_reviews.author: TW

customer_reviews.title: The product is not so good!
customer_reviews.text: It's helps with the value of your money. my safe comes in handy so I thought the keypad keeps sticking will not open. I shouldn't have to keep using the pass key to open the safe. Return!!!
customer_reviews.author: Diamond

customer_reviews.title: Perfect For A Home Or Small Business
customer_reviews.text: Just received it so I'm only going to give it 4 stars for now and update this review if anything changes. It is very light-weight so I highly recommend bolting it down to something that can't be moved. The set-up instructions are easy to follow. It only took us a few minutes to create a new passcode and have it operational.
customer_reviews.author: Sunrise Resorts

customer_reviews.title: Worry free
customer_reviews.text: Like knowing that my valuables are safe and secure worry free
customer_reviews.author: Yes Linda Davis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect safe!
customer_reviews.text: Phenomenal quality, perfect size as described! I couldn't be happier!!
customer_reviews.author: Ezbobber55

customer_reviews.title: Good Value!
customer_reviews.text: For the price and what it is, this has worked out really great. Easy to set and work with.
customer_reviews.author: The Chanberland Family

customer_reviews.title: Safe
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use and all the space I need!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha LaCroix

product_meta.title: SereneLife Drop Box Safe Box | Safes & Lock Boxes | Front Loading Safe Cash Vault Drop Lock | Safe Security Box | Digital Safe Box | Money Safe Box | Steel Alloy Drop Safe Includes Keys (SLSFE342)
product_meta.description:
Size:13.8" x 9.8"| Style Name:Deposit SlotThe SereneLife Safe Box will keep your valuables secure & protected.Use the front panel digital button pad to easily control the electronic locking system. Enjoy hassle-free operation and quick access to your belongings after entering your customizable key code. The safe box also allows for manual access with (2) included keys. Additional features include rugged steel alloy construction, dual security steel door locking bolts, corrosion & stain-resistant powder coat finish, pre-drilled anchor holes for permanent mounting in a convenient location, along with a convenient slot ‘drop-in’ cutout window for depositing documents or bills without the need of unlocking. Store your valuables and keep them protected with the SereneLife Electronic Safe Box. 

Features:



 * Heavy-Duty, Rugged & Reliable Safe Box
 * Electronic Lock System with Mechanical Override Includes (2) Keys for Manual Safe Access
 * Digital Touch Button Control Pad 
 * Customizable Password/Key Code Setting 
 * Convenient ‘Drop-in’ Slot Window for Documents/Bill Insertion 
 * Reinforced Solid Steel Wall Construction 
 * Dual Security Steel Door Locking Bolts 
 * Corrosion & Stain-Resistant Powder Coat Finish
 * Pre-Drilled Anchor Holes for Wall/Floor Mounting 
 * Perfect for Home, Office or Business Use


What’s in the Box:

 * Safe Box 
 * Mounting Bolts
 * (2) Keys 
 * (4) x ‘AA’ Batteries


Technical Specs:

 * Construction Material: Engineered Steel Alloy
 * Steel Thickness: 4mm Door, 2mm Body 
 * Battery Operated Digital Panel: Requires 4 x ‘AA’ Batteries
 * Total Safe Dimensions (L x W x H): 13.8’’ x 9.8’’ x 9.8’’
 * Sold as: 1
 * Weight: 20.14 lbs.
feature_bullets: STRONG & SECURE: The safe box is made of reinforced solid steel wall construction. Dual security steel door locking bolts & a corrosion & stain-resistant powder coat finish keep the security box safe.
EASY TO ACCESS: The drop box safe has a convenient slot ‘drop-in’ cutout window for depositing documents or bills without the need of unlocking.The key safe box includes two keys for manual access.
EASY TO INSTALL: The wall safe box has pre-drilled holes for wall or floor mounting. Includes mounting bolts, and four AA batteries to control the battery operated digital panel.

FINGER SENSOR TECHNOLOGY: The digital safe box features a digital touch screen control pad for added security. Users must use their thumb finger & should make sure the finger they use is dry & scar free.
PROTECT YOUR ASSETS: The key safe lock box is perfect for protecting guns, documents, jewelry, etc. Great for home, office or business use.
